forecasts.raw_text: W winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 3 to 5 ft. Wave detail: S 4 ft at 7 seconds and NE 3 ft at 10 seconds. Patchy fog. Patchy fog late. A slight chance of rain late. Vsby 1 nm or less, increasing to 1 to 3 nm late.
